alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 8:59PM EST until February 22 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze up to five-hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain may mix with snow at the onset, mainly before 6 AM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
